lead_paragraph: The United States Grand Prix will return for the eighth year to Indianapolis Motor Speedway in 2007, speedway officials announced yesterday. The deal with Formula One is for one year only, but the speedway hopes to hold the race far into the future.
snippet: The United States Grand Prix will return for the eighth year to Indianapolis Motor Speedway in 2007, speedway officials announced yesterday. The deal with Formula One is for one year only, but the speedway hopes to hold the race far into the future.
